channel.title: renovai
channel.description: Visual AI Shopping Assistance for Lifestyle Brands

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Your one stop-shop for visual content creation
Simplify visual content production and reduce costs, while creating immersive engaging experiences at scale.
Creating 3D products at scale by sampling your 2D product page photos.

Automate your product photography process, delivering 360° & 3D products on white or transparent backgrounds, product focused zoomed-in lifestyle imagery empowering you customers all the way to conversion.
Provide context and style around your products without the production hassle. Offering unlimited inspirations to each anchor product to increase engagement and make your brand story memorable.
Creating 3D products at scale by sampling your 2D product page photos.
Drive conversion and maximize lifetime customer value by providing better recommendations at the perfect time.
Full room scenes creating a completely different setting for each shopper around the same anchor product.
2D inspirational interactive boards, enhancing product focused display with visually similar and complimentary recommendations.
Playful and interactive 3D solution ascertaining the shoppers’ needs and requirements, ideal for designing a full room with the most relevant items.
Refine personal goals with a short questionnaire, and our Scout will serve as a personal stylist, seamlessly showcasing the most relevant items.

Turning brick and mortar stores into an online experience with our personalized landing page, providing various room types and mix & match furniture possibilities. Combining ML and decades of interior design knowledge to create the ideal room for each shopper.
Leverage AI abilities to create new- age remarketing methods, distinguishing your brand identity with campaigns that convert.

Create a coherent visual language for your multi-channel marketing strategy based on website interactions and complete funnel optimization – adaptable for all social media platforms and email marketing.
Boost visual appeal and ignite your shopper imagination with lifestyle images and professional product display options.
Create campaigns that convert while maintaining your brand identity and promoting your signature products.
The best wingmen your sales reps ever had
Save costs, elevate and modernize in-store experiences.
Streamline the shopping process and create more satisfying customer experiences, surfacing the exact products within seconds.
Adaptable for all devices and kiosks, we bring your product catalog to life in a personalized manner from the first interaction.
Adding a multi-room scene digital platform to your instore display saves major costs and ensures exposing your customers to your complete product catalog in just a few clicks.
Instant display of changes for fabric, color and specific features.
Shortening the path from search to conversion with hyper-personalized visual commerce.
Transforming categories to bespoke catalogues with a single click, creating a compelling and personal product discovery process.
Putting a stop to statistics 'You may also like' features with curated exact results – seamlessly giving your shoppers what they expect.
